head.title: Move {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to effortlessly reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Process PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and more with ease.

header.title: Move pages in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enables {{EnvNameShort}} applications to easily reorder pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing tool that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives. It provides essential features such as merging, splitting, extracting, moving, swapping, and deleting pages.

more_features.title: Advanced document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a comprehensive set of features, allowing you to efficiently process over 50 widely used business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge documents in various formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, images, archives, and more. Use flexible options to achieve the desired results.

feature_2.title: Manage document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages within documents. Move, swap, or remove pages to better organize your content.

feature_3.title: Adjust page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between landscape and portrait orientation.

feature_4.title: Extract pages into separate files
feature_4.content: Select and extract specific pages, saving them as standalone documents.

formats.title: Reorder pages in multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, making document manipulation flexible and efficient.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Explore additional powerful capabilities of our solution.

examples.comment_1: Create a {{NameProduct}} instance with the source file
examples.comment_2: Specify the page number to be moved
examples.comment_3: Move the page to the new position

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to move selected pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications with advanced document processing features.
content.step_1: Provide the file path of the source {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Specify the page number and its new position.

code_1.title: Move a page to the end of the document
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to move a specific page to the end of a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_1: Pass the source file path to the constructor
code_1.comment_2: Retrieve document details and the last page number
code_1.comment_3: Set up options with the page numbers
code_1.comment_4: Move the page to the end of the document
code_1.comment_5: Save the updated document to a new location
